skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.
Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Damsel where their magical gifts are needed most.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Acolytes too are blessed by the Lady's spirit, enabling them to resist magical attacks.
From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Blessed by the lady herself, the Grail Damsel shields the faithful from harm.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The enemy's missiles and spells shed some of their momentum at the Damsel's behest.
The Damsel's prayers empower her with the glory and faith of the Lady of the Lake.
The enemy's blows are magically deflected, giving the Damsel more time to focus on her magic.
Casting aside spoiled tokens of virtue and nobility, the Damsel beseeches the Lady to hinder the enemy's weapons.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: -2
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_name: A Soft Spot for the Small Folk
skillTree.localised_description: The affection of somebody so righteous and powerful is rare to the small folk of Bretonnia; the Damsel's very presence steels their resolve.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 1% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 3% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 5% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The peasants know of the Damsel's beauty, but once the men-at-arms behold her in person, they fight with the bravery of a knight to please her.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.
The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker
Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker
Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active
Entities cannot die while ability is active
Entities cannot die while ability is active

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Regrowth Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Strong vs single and multiple units
Strong vs single and multiple units

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Dwellers Below"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.
